section.p:
If there is a tick in the box, immediately.
If not, , and read on.
The priestess, who is wearing the skin of a wolf, and is covered in red paint, welcomes you gleefully.
‘At last, the tusk of a were-boar! Now the ceremony can go ahead.’

Cross the boar’s tusk off
your Adventure Sheet. The priestess rewards you with knowledge.
Add 1 to your SCOUTING rating permanently .
